1584530.name: Elevated
1584530.description:
Jump into Elevated, an action arcade shooter where you must battle to survive against constant, ever growing waves of robotic enemies. Utilize new weapons, face harder opponents, and smash your friends high scores on the online leader boards. Increase the enemy difficulty to boost your score further as you fight to reach new heights.

The Firepower

Utilize powerful, unique weapons found in your playthroughs to slay your enemies. Weapons drop randomly so no playthrough will be the same! Switch your weapons to diversify your builds and become unstoppable, increasing your multiplier and push your score higher!

The Powerups

Slay enemies to collect overpowered modifiers to temporarily boost your firepower to unseen heights. Use these modifiers during play to unlock even more powerups and weapons to collect and utilize in future attempts. Learn to adapt and utilise the tools at your disposal to overcome your opponents and achieve new high scores!

The Leaderboards

Rise through the ranks of the global online leader boards! Crush your friends and become the number 1 player!

The Maps

The game currently features 4 maps, each with their own unique mechanics and features. Try not to fall from the sky on Hexes, watch out you don't get pushed into lasers on Conveyor, and keep the darkness at bay on Dark Shaft!

Main Features:

  • Global online high score leaderboards to rise to the top up!
  • Over 40 unique weapons to unlock and fight with.
  • Tons of different stacking weapon powerups to change the way you play.
  • A wide range of enemy robots to encounter and fight against.
1584530.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
